name: frdl/oidplus-io4-bridge-plugin
description: Bridge from OIDplus to Webfat/IO4, OIDplus Composer (Plugins) GUI, Admin-/Devtools, OIDplus Setup

suggest.danielmarschall/oidplus: The main project, this must be your root composer.json project!
suggest.frdl/oiplus-composer-plugin: Composer Plugin for OIDplus Installations, MUST be required first in the root project, enables OIDplus composer bridges/plugins/admin-gui...
